Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Mariah Laidlaw
Reviews.Content: The phone came on time was in original packaging everything was in the box. Turned on right and is working right, although i did have some trouble with the messaging at first but i figured it out. Nice phone for the price and i am so happy this has Wifi

Reviews.Title: Unlocked GSM phone
Reviews.Author: jenna2
Reviews.Content: Happy with the phone, received promptly, unopened box, phone appears really brand new.Since it is unlocked, this is what I am going to bring with me when I travel abroad. Saving money for not paying for data, wifi works.
